name: Escape (itch) (kmce)
description:
This is my solo entry for the Snappy Gururs Game Jam 2022 for the theme of "Ignorance is Bliss". I struggled for an idea for this game, and therefore feel the game is a bit of a stretch to match the theme.

Issues : Unfortunately, I only found out that the Unity Visual Effects Graph is not supported on WebGL, and therefore the lasers within the game can not be seen. 

If you want to play the version where lasers can be seen, there is a windows build of it, which can be found here. https://kmce.itch.io/escape-download-version

Escape!!

You have been kidnapped and are being watched by CCTV cameras with lasers attached. The cameras will ignore you in the dark. Memorise the path to the exit and try and escape. 

If you need it, you have a headlight attached, which can be activated using 'E'. Be careful though, the cameras will notice you instantly with it on

On level 2, the lasers are used to indicate where you are, but since they are not working you can not see where you are. So for level two, you spawn in the bottom right hand side of the level, next to the boxes

WASD - Walk

Mouse - Look around

Space - Jump

E - Headlight on/off

Esc - Quit

Audio for the game was sourced from freesound.org
